tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wrestling_programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255),
  coach_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE wrestling_training_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    program_description TEXT,
    duration_hours INT,
    training_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE coaches (
    coach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coach_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    expertise_area VARCHAR(100),
    experience_years INT,
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
);
CREATE TABLE wrestling_training_programs (id INT PRIMARY KEY, program_name VARCHAR(255), program_description TEXT, coach_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE coaches (id INT PRIMARY KEY, coach_name VARCHAR(255), specialization VARCHAR(255), experience_years INT);
CREATE TABLE training_sessions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, session_name VARCHAR(255), session_description TEXT, coach_id INT, location VARCHAR(255), session_date DATE, max_capacity INT);
CREATE TABLE wrestlers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, wrestler_name VARCHAR(255), wrestling_style VARCHAR(255), experience_years INT);
CREATE TABLE wrestler_training_session (wrestler_id INT, session_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (wrestler_id, session_id));
